root.query: Select ACCOUNT_ID, SSN, STATUS, TYPE, DATEOPENED, DATECLOSED From ACCOUNT Order By SSN
Select SSN, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, ST_ADDRESS, APT_NUMBER, CITY, STATE, ZIPCODE, PHONE From CUSTOMER

query.name: Query3
query.sql: insert into Product (ID, SYMBOL, COMPANY_NAME) values(?, ?, ?) 9999 'RHT' 'Red Hat Inc'
